definitions.definition: An addictive, semisynthetic opioid (trademark OxyContin ) that is similar to morphine in effect and structure; C 18 H 21 NO 4 .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry , pharmacology ) An addictive, semisynthetic opioid (trademark OxyContin ) that is similar to morphine in effect and structure; C 18 H 21 NO 4 .
